text: Looks like there is some CSS hiding it below 767

Hello community,

I am integrating a web platform with HubSpot and I have a question around *marketing forms* and *submissions*
In my site I have a non-HubSpot registration form that is currently creating *contacts* in HubSpot. I want to additionally send a hidden input value so that a custom property is set in the *contact*. Is this possible?

Thanks

If I send the input as non-hidden then the contact property is set properly. But the value I am sending would not be filled in by users, so it needs to remain hidden. But when sent hidden, it is not picked up by the submission
I think this is exactly what I need. Thank you very much <@U058ZPH175H>
If i have the HubSpot plugin installed on WP , do the CTA's map over as well?

• Be inclusive (try not to say, "Hey guys, hey boys, hey [any specific group]")
• No self promotion, except for <#C0121KGC6RM|showcase> and <#CBNDYJJAZ|jobs> 
• No unsolicited DMs

Hey <@U06E75EJJM7>, deleting this duplicate post as we are discussing this in <#C22PJ878V|random>

Anyone have experience using Commerce Layer to add ecommerce to CMS Hub? Have a client that wants to use CMS Hub + ecommerce but doesn't want the ecommerce to live on a subdomain (so they can do things like keep an updated shopping cart visible on non-ecom pages, checkout via sidebar on any page, etc.) - open to solutions other than Commerce Layer as well.

Hello All,

How can i fetch all documents that are attached to contact and/or deal records?
Is there a way to at least filter which records have an attached document/file? We need to export all these files and documents, and we are not able to do so!

Thanks!
